tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The Doctor and his wife both are very disciplined, dedicated *** ******* *************. They are flexible to adjust with your office timings and they surely provide value for money treatment. 
They explain each and every issue that your tooth has and will inform you the step by step treatment process and duration.
I had three broken front upper tooth which needed RCT for its longevity and the Caps to make all the three tooth look better as all the three were broken.
Delighted to have known such wonderful doctors.

I've had a great experience with this Doctor. I have had pain in two of my teeth for a week or so when I visited this Doctor.

I was promptly diagnosed with two teeth whose pulp was exposed and rotten. I was clearly explained the reason for this, shown xrays and options for treatment. I was shown the various treatment they could do, listed the pros and cons of each type of treatment and what would happen if I chose one treatment over the other. 

Dr. Reddy and guided me through these options and recommended that I get root canal treatment for two teeth and a minor filling for another tooth.

It took me a few sittings since I had three teeth to get fixed but he and his RCT expert made it convenient considering my schedule and did a completely painless root canal treatment.

Throughout the process they gave me instructions on what to expect during the treatment, how to take care of the affected teeth and managed the entire treatment without any pain at all.

I must reiterate that the entire process was completely painless.

They also provided me options for the caps and discussed with me the pros and cons of each type of cap. The whole process was completely around my schedule, the doctor is available on whatsapp to discuss treatment during the entire process too.

I felt that the prices were entirely reasonable too.

I rate this doctor 10/10.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor is very good. He will take his time to diagnos the patient completely and also he will explain the root cause of the problem with the help of teeth and jaw model etc. and also he gave a good advice. I like the diagnos down by doctor.

Thanks to Dr. Santosh.

I know this clinic since 2 years now. I know both the doctors, they are very supportive, explains clearly what is the problem and what are the steps they need to follow. I would definitely recommend this hospital for any one irrespective of age for any dental  problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Fixed Partial Denture (FPD),Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: Both wife and husband run this hospital with a team of mid level exp doctors. They are very good doctors, down to earth. They behave professionally yet not loosing the human touch. They are subject matter experts. Listens to problems and clarifies all the questions without getting irritated. Educated us about the treatment plan. He explained every problem thing showing us the X-Ray. Treatment is going very well. Actually we consulted this doctor 5 years ago.

context: Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,Dental Cavities,
review:
** ** *** ** *** **** ****** ****** ** **********both the doctors are very kind, friendly people and especially not money minded, explains clearly about the problem and give ample time to patients and listen to them clearly and provides good treatment, my wife and mother are got treated here and they were very happy with a great smile... in face ....Thank you sathosh garu

I strongly recommend Dr.Santosh
reply_text: Thanx pradeep for appreciation, we will yet try to improvise than what we are

review: He explained the process well and expected the same without any hassles. The procedure was painless and smooth.
it is very good experience for this visit. they tested my mother teeth completely and explained root cause and shown some sample teeth pic, shown the teeth positions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Friendly nature and very satisfactory treatment.**** ********* ***** ** *** *********** ** *** ********There is no waiting time.
Booked appointment with Dr. Santosh. But got treated by junior doctor. Dr. Santosh is not there. Asked to visit again for head doctor.

review: It was a wonderfull experience.Doctor is fabulous. Explain everything before dping any process. Every single minute keep on updating you about the process he is doing at that time so as to make the patient aware of what is going on with his teeth. Full numbers for his proffesionalism and duty towards patient. Cheers up for the good work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
The clinic, doctors and assistant doctors are really good, helpful and thye explain your problem in detail.
However, I always feel that tooth extraction charges are very high in Hyderabad and this clinic is no exception.
Their nominal charges for 1 wisdom tooth extraction starts from 1800-2000 and I had to pay 3000INR for mine. I most other cities including Mumbai, starting charges are from 700 INR.
Doctor and all the staffs were very good. They explained everything before RCT . Cost also very reasonable
Really good.********** *** **** ***** ** *** ********There is problem with wisdom teeth.Doctor suggested me to get it removed.

Doctor is very supportive and honest. I surely recommend the doctor. received good treatment.
Hospital is also well maintained, they have all facilities equipped.
I got done my filling, it was well done, good treatment, I feel very normal after doctor doing my filling, I could eat veryhappily

Best painless treatment, good doctors and staff, the clinic is well equipped with latest equipments like DENTAL LASERS, DIGITAL  XRAYS, INTRA OARL CAMERA, nice ambience, I reccomend this dental hospital for all who need best dental care

Great experience,  I got my wisdom tooth removal done, it was not painful as I expected to be, the doctors here have attended well, there is good team work and coordination among the doctors and staff, very systema ticket in delivering dental services, the dental hospital very patient friendly, I would prefer all my friends and known people to get treatment done here, thanks for the DSR SRI BALAJI DENTAL team
Went for dental filling but doctor recommended root canal. Took a second opinion and just a filling was recommended and got filling done by another doctor.
reply_text: I explained you we would do filling first and by any chance if pain occurs after filling immediately or later on, then you need to undergo root canal treatment depending on the clinical situation, so I was very much ready to do filling, but you were not decided  for filling then, please wrte my complete explanation/opinion of treatment in your review when you  visted our clinic,  thank u for visiting us

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: The interaction was immensely satisfying. The interaction was very much comfortable. The clinic was referred by Mr Satuanarayan Senapaty an existing client. Definitely would recommend to friends and relatives.
